member.name: T:AppCode.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:AppCode.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:AppCode.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:AppCode.AppConfiguration
member.summary: The AppConfiguaration class contains read-only properties that are essentially short cuts to settings in the web.config file.

member.name: P:AppCode.AppConfiguration.ConnectionString
member.summary: Returns the connectionstring for the application.

member.name: P:AppCode.AppConfiguration.ConnectionStringName
member.summary: Returns the name of the current connectionstring for the application.
